Name: PR001-Fly tip Cust email
Output_template:
{"subject":"Report fly tipping {reference}","fromName":"Portsmouth City Council","from":"noreply@portsmouthcc.gov.uk","recipients_to":"{yourDetails/Email_Address_out}","recipients_cc":"","recipients_bcc":"","pdf_attachments":"","body":"
Dear customer,

Thank you for reporting the issue relating to unauthorised waste to Portsmouth City Council. Your reference number is {case_ref}.

The next step is that we do an initial investigation, which may include a visit to the site, before deciding how best to proceed.

In some instances we cannot provide the solution, and if this happens we will be in touch to let you know.

If you have any other additional information, please feel free to call us on 0800 0853840

Yours sincerely,

The Safe, Clean and Tidy Team

Portsmouth City Council
